episodes.title: Inside the Cult That Controlled My Life: My Escape From The Family International
episodes.description:
I was involved with The Family International, and in this video I’m finally talking openly about what I experienced inside the group and why I eventually decided to leave. This is my honest account of the culture, expectations, pressure, and the moment everything clicked and I knew I had to walk away. We talk about how the group operated, what daily life felt like, the psychological and emotional impact, and what leaving meant for me afterward. My goal is simply to share my experience in a straightforward and truthful way and help others understand what high control groups can look like. If you have ever been part of anything strict, controlling, or manipulative, parts of this story may feel familiar.

*****************************************************************************
Links:
http://www.exfamily.org/index.htm
https://www.xfamily.org/index.php/Main_Page
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/zghBGwTOAPk
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/ETvshr8EAhY
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/NPELB0CtDns
*****************************************************************************


❌ No Topic is Off-Limits ❌
✅ Politics & economics
✅ Religion & culture
✅ Conspiracy theories 🛸
✅ Ghost stories 👻
✅ Life in Poland 🇵🇱
✅ And so much more!

This isn’t about creating an echo chamber, I’m here for honest conversations, different viewpoints, and real dialogue. 🎤

💡 Want to be a guest?
If you have a unique perspective or story to share, I’d love to talk to you! Reach out! 📩

🎬 A Work in Progress 🎬
📸 Still learning editing, lighting, and camera work

🚀 It’s only going to get better from here!

episodes.title: Inside the Family International Cult (Part 2) — The Beliefs They Tried to Force on Me
episodes.description:
Part 2 of my story escaping The Family International (Children of God).
In this episode, I reveal the disturbing beliefs they were teaching, and how these teachings shaped my view of the organization (spoiler alert: not in a good way), and how it damaged the people who were born into it through systemic abuse that was ubiquitous across every level of the organization.

The Family taught us that the outside world was dangerous, calling it “the system,” and convinced us that we were God’s chosen people. But what they hid behind that idea were teachings built on abuse, manipulation, and outright insanity.


⚠️ **DISCLAIMER:**  
Disclaimer: The events and individuals discussed in this video are based on personal experiences and publicly available information. All claims are alleged and are presented for educational and awareness purposes only.

*****************************************************************************
Links:
http://www.exfamily.org/index.htm
https://www.xfamily.org/index.php/Main_Page
*****************************************************************************



🗣 I want to hear from you!
Agree or disagree? Let me know in the comments! I value open discussion and different perspectives.

🌍 What to Expect from People of Poland
👥 This is a space for everyone—expats, native-born Poles, and Polish people living abroad.
🚀 I see Poland rising as a global leader, and I’m excited to explore its culture, economy, and people.
📍 I’ll also be doing street interviews in Krakow—stay tuned for updates!

episodes.title: How I Got Pulled Into a Cult: The Family International (Part 1)
episodes.description:
🎥 In this video, I share my personal story of how I got involved in **The Family International** aka the children of god, a group widely regarded as a cult. What started as a search for purpose and belonging slowly turned into something much darker, spiritual control, emotional manipulation, and isolation from the outside world.

This is **Part 1** of a multi-part series where I break down:
• How I was introduced to The Family  
• The red flags I missed  
• What life inside the group was like  
• How they used religion as a tool for control

⛔ This is NOT sensationalized. It's a real story. I lived it.

🧠 If you’ve ever wondered:
• "What is The Family International?"  
• "How do people get trapped in cults?"  
• "Could this happen to me or someone I love?"  
You're in the right place.

📢 **Let’s talk in the comments**  
Have you ever encountered a high-control group? Or noticed cult-like behavior in places you didn’t expect? I’d love to hear your story.

💬 Drop a comment. Let’s make this a safe space for survivors, skeptics, and the curious.

*****************************************************************************
Links:
https://www.youtube.com/@UCUaliZ97qmVen7E6uFM9fFg 
http://www.exfamily.org/index.htm
https://www.xfamily.org/index.php/Main_Page
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqil-rab84U
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BE0cAIVE3Q8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URAQ9zznUNI
*****************************************************************************

⚠️ **DISCLAIMER:**  
All views expressed in this video are based on my **personal experiences and opinions**.  
Any references to abuse, exploitation, or misconduct are **alleged**, based on public reporting, survivor accounts, and documentation widely available online.  
Nothing in this video should be taken as a statement of proven fact regarding individuals or the organization.


🗣 I want to hear from you!
Agree or disagree? Let me know in the comments! I value open discussion and different perspectives.

🌍 What to Expect from People of Poland
👥 This is a space for everyone—expats, native-born Poles, and Polish people living abroad.
🚀 I see Poland rising as a global leader, and I’m excited to explore its culture, economy, and people.
📍 I’ll also be doing street interviews in Krakow—stay tuned for updates!
